headline: Robinhood (HOOD) Stock Selloff May Be Overblown, Said Truist
summary: Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) ranks among the best high growth high margin stocks to buy now. Truist Securities reduced its price target for Robinhood Markets Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) to $130 from $155 on February 6, keeping a Buy rating on the company’s shares. Despite the cut, Truist warned that the market reaction could be overblown, considering […]

headline: Truist and Evercore Lift Targets on Genuine Parts (GPC) as Momentum Builds
summary: Genuine Parts Company (NYSE:GPC) is included among the 13 Cheapest Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in. On February 12, Truist raised its price recommendation on Genuine Parts Company (NYSE:GPC) to $162 from $146 and kept a Buy rating in place. The firm sees a supportive setup heading into Q4. In its view, the automotive segment should […]

headline: Truist Open Banking Move With Mastercard And What It Means For Valuation
summary: Truist Financial (NYSE:TFC) has launched its first open banking integration through Mastercard's open finance platform. The partnership provides Truist clients with secure, centralized access to their financial data via direct API connections. The launch enables Truist customers to connect their accounts to participating fintech apps while keeping data access controlled and transparent. For you as an investor, this move places Truist within ongoing changes in digital banking and data...
